properties.name: bisonfun.tmdb.read-access-key
properties.description: Read Access API key for TheMovieDB.

properties.name: bisonfun.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret Key for signing the access JWT.

properties.name: bisonfun.jwt.time.access
properties.description: Expiration time in millis for access token.

properties.name: bisonfun.jwt.time.refresh
properties.description: Expiration time in millis for refresh token.

properties.name: bisonfun.rate-limit.requests-per-second
properties.description: Rate limit for requests per one second.

properties.name: bisonfun.rate-limit.requests-per-minute
properties.description: Rate limit for requests per one minute.

properties.name: bisonfun.data-update.range-in-days
properties.description: Range in days between data update from external sources.
